79063.summary: Some customers in the Strathcona & Strathcona area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
79063.title: June 25 - Edmonton (Strathcona & Strathcona) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

79081.summary: Some customers in the Millrise area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
79081.title: June 25 - Calgary (Millrise) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
